title: Markets Update: CEO David Solomon Shares His Perspectives on the Current Environment
description: Goldman Sachs Chairman and CEO David Solomon shares his views on the pandemic and the economic impact, alongside other of the firm’s senior leaders.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
itunes:summary: Goldman Sachs Chairman and CEO David Solomon shares his views on the pandemic and the economic impact, alongside other of the firm’s senior leaders.
